amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that requires the prosecution as adults of juveniles who are charged with conspiracy to commit drug crimes under the Controlled Substance Act and the Controlled Substance Import and Export Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provision of the bill requiring the prosecution as adults of juveniles who are charged with conspiracy to commit drug crimes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 320 (Roll no. 112).
